name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate Exam
description: Do you need to earn your AWS Solution Architect certification? If so, youve come to the right place!  With 10 practice exams containing 20 questions each, I have carefully hand-crafted each question to put you to the test. After passing these exams, you will be fully prepared for what it is like to take the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate Exam.  This course is designed around the official Exam Guide from AWS, weighting the Knowledge Areas appropriately, so you can pass the actual Exam with confidence!   You wont be hoping you are ready, you will know you are ready to pass the exam, saving you time and money. After practicing these tests and scoring an 85% or higher on them, you will be ready to PASS on the first attempt and avoid costly re-scheduling fees.   After each practice exam attempt, you will receive your total final score, along with feedback on each and every question -- telling you exactly why each answer is correct so that you can pinpoint the areas in which you need to improve and perform some additional studying.   These Practice Exams have the timed test taking capability and provides you with interactive, question-level feedback.    Wed love to hear from you. Please send your feedback to getmycertif@gmail.com.
